gov.nasa.worldwind.render
Class ExtrudedPolygon.Cap

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable
Enclosing class:
ExtrudedPolygon
protected static class ExtrudedPolygon.Cap
extends Object
implements Disposable

An internal class used to tessellate the polygon itself and produce the indices needed to draw it.

tessellatePolygon

protected void tessellatePolygon(FloatBuffer vertices,
                                 int numVerts,
                                 Vec4 normal)
Tessellates the polygon from its vertices.

Parameters:
vertices - the polygon vertices.
numVerts - the number of vertices from the buffer to use. The first numVerts are used.
normal - a unit normal vector for the plane containing the polygon vertices.
